name: The Misadventures of Hoppy & Betty (DEMO)
description:
Play as Hoppy, a frog who finds himself lost in a strange laboratory in a world that clearly doesn't want him. Journey through this wasted world as Hoppy learns nothing and causes as much mischief as frogly possible. 

The Misadventures of Hoppy & Betty is a tile-based puzzle game with an emphasis on puzzle solving tools and mechanics. This includes the ability to undo any wrong move,  tile-based traversal, and a wide array of movement options.  Over 40 unique puzzles and 2 Boss Fights!

The downloadable version runs much faster than the web version, and is the recommended experience for those who can run it.

CONTROLS:

ESC - Pause Menu

WASD - Walking

SPACE - Wait

Q - Possess

E - Tongue Grab

R - Camera Mode

SHIFT - Squat

Z - Undo

X - Reset

C - Default Camera Settings

O - Quest List

P - Taunt
